name: Beginner Ball Game
description:
Final Result of the Unity 3D Game Beginner Tutorial created by the Last Checkpoint. The tutorial series covers the basics ranging from game objects, materials, basic scripting, and UI components. Follow the YouTube link below for step by step instructions on creating this game yourself.
